Social And Cultural Activities: Providing hostel for socially and economically weaker and backward children; working for mass-awakening against religious and social conventions, evils; running more than two dozens educational institutions and working for extending health facilities to rural areas
Favourite Pastime and Recreation: Gardening, religious discourses, bhajans and touring religious spots
Literary Artistic & Scientific Accomplis: Chief Editor, `Hindi weekly` and monthly magazine `Yogvani`
Special Interests: Campaigning for cow-protection and promotion; Rashtra Raksha Abhiyan for social and national security
Educational Qualifications: B.Sc. Educated at H.N.B. Garhwal University, Srinagar, Uttarakhand
